price: 20. (Muuse) wuxuu yidhi: “Waxaan falay  anigoon wax garanayn.
arabic: قَالَ فَعَلۡتُهَآ إِذٗا وَأَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qāla faʿaltuhā idhan wa-anā mina al-ḍālīna
